articles.author: Abhishek Mishra3
articles.title: Explore the Cosmos: A summer road trip with Nasa's Chandra and Webb - The Times of India
articles.description: The tour begins with Rho Ophiuchi, about 390 light-years away. This nearby star-forming region features a mix of gas and stars. Chandra's X-rays, shown in purple, highlight young stars, while Webb's infrared data in various colors reveal intricate gas and dus…
